appetizers.name: Mozzarella Sticks
appetizers.description: Mozzarella and Asiago cheese. Sprinkled with Parmesan-Romano. Served with marinara sauce.

appetizers.name: Loaded Potato Skins
appetizers.description: Crispy Maine-Grown white potatoes topped with a layer of melted mozzarella, cheddar, and crispy bacon. Served with Ranch sour cream topped with green onions.

appetizers.name: Tostado Nachos
appetizers.description: Crispy tortillas loaded with seasoned ground beef mixed with refried beans and melted cheese. Served with house-made guacamole, fire-roasted salsa and sour cream. Topped with spicy jalapeños.

cold sandwiches.name: Sun-dried Tomato Turkey
cold sandwiches.description: Sliced turkey, cheddar cheese and mixed greens served on sourdough bread with sun-dried tomato spread

cold sandwiches.name: Cafe Ham Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: Black forest ham, cheddar cheese and mixed greens, with savory orange/cranberry spread on wheat berry bread

hot sandwiches.name: Chipotle Chicken Avocado Melt
hot sandwiches.description: Smoked, pulled chicken raised without antibiotics, smoked Gouda, fresh avocado and cilantro, zesty sweet Peppadew™ piquant peppers and chipotle mayo on Black Pepper Focaccia.

hot sandwiches.name: Toasted Frontega Chicken
hot sandwiches.description: Smoked, pulled chicken raised without antibiotics, mozzarella, vine-ripened tomatoes, red onions, chopped basil and chipotle mayo all grilled on Focaccia.

hot sandwiches.name: Toasted Steak & White Cheddar
hot sandwiches.description: Seared steak, pickled red onions, Vermont white cheddar and horseradish sauce all grilled on Artisan Ciabatta.

desserts.name: Almond Croissant
desserts.description: A freshly baked, perfectly flaky butter croissant stuffed with almond cream filling and sliced almonds, topped with cane sugar syrup and a dusting of powdered sugar.

desserts.name: Oatmeal Raisin with Berries Cookie
desserts.description: A chewy oatmeal raisin cookie with sweetened, dried cranberries and infused, dried strawberries and blueberries.

desserts.name: Pastry Ring
desserts.description: Freshly baked, fluted ring with cherry and apple fruit fillings and our special recipe cheese filling.

drinks.name: ACAI BERRY BOOST
drinks.description: Acai, pomegranate, banana, blueberries & strawberries smoothie

drinks.name: ORANGE GINGER GLOW
drinks.description: Mango, fresh ginger, green apple, pineapple, carrot & orange juice smoothie
